TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit QuickLinkCreator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a set of utilities to support creating quick links on the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientLink (string strTitle, string strClientGetScript, string strType);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientLink(string strTitle, string strClientGetScript, string strType) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetClientLink (strTitle As String, strClientGetScript As String, strType As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ GetClientLink(System::String ^ strTitle, System::String ^ strClientGetScript, System::String ^ strType);
static member GetClientLink : string * string * string -> string

Docs.param: The object that represents the title of the quick link.
This object that represents the URL to which the quick link redirects.
This object that represents the type of the quick link.
Docs.summary: Returns the JavaScript used to submit the form to create the quick link with the specified title, URL, and type parameters.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the JavaScript function used to submit the form to create the quick link.

remarks.para: This method returns the JavaScript used to create the quick link when the user clicks a link. The returned JavaScript stores the title, URL and type in hidden fields, and then submits the form to create the quick link.

Docs.param: The object that represents the title of the quick link.
The object that represents the URL to which the quick link redirects.
The object that represents the type of the quick link.
The object that represents the JavaScript function that is called when the user clicks the quick link.
Docs.summary: Returns the JavaScript used to submit the form to create the quick link with the specified title, URL, type and the JavaScript function that is called when the user clicks the quick link.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the JavaScript function used to submit the form to create the quick link.

remarks.para: This method returns the JavaScript used to create the quick link when the user clicks a link. The returned JavaScript stores the title, URL, type and the JavaScript function that is called when the user clicks the quick link in hidden fields, and then submits the form to create the quick link.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetLink (string strType);
.method public static hidebysig string GetLink(string strType) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that represents the type of the quick link.
Docs.summary: Returns the JavaScript used to submit the form to create the quick link with the specified type parameter.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the JavaScript function used to submit the form to create the quick link.

remarks.para: This method returns the JavaScript used to create the quick link when the user clicks a link. The returned JavaScript stores the title of the current page, the URL that links to the current page, the type of the hidden fields, and then submits the form to create the quick link.

Docs.summary: Returns the JavaScript used to submit the form to create the quick link with the specified title, URL, and type parameters.

remarks.para: This method returns the JavaScript used to create the quick link when then user clicks a link. The JavaScript saves the title, the URL that is obtained from the browser and the type in hidden fields, and then submits the form to create the quick link.

Docs.param: The object that represents the account of a colleague.
Docs.summary: Returns the JavaScript used to submit the form to create the colleague quick link with the specified account parameter.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the JavaScript function used to submit the form to create the colleague quick link.

remarks.para: This method returns the JavaScript used to create the quick link when the user clicks a link. The JavaScript stores the account in hidden fields, and then submits the form to create the colleague quick link in the personal site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Initialize (System.Web.UI.Page page);
.method public static hidebysig void Initialize(class System.Web.UI.Page page) cil managed
public: static void Initialize(System::Web::UI::Page ^ page);
static member Initialize : System.Web.UI.Page -> unit

Docs.param: The object that represents the page that needs to be initialized.
Docs.summary: Registers the necessary hidden fields and JavaScript on the page to support creating quick links.

remarks.para: This static method registers the HTML hidden fields that contain the information of the quick link, such as title and URL, and the JavaScript functions that are used to create quick links. The key of the JavaScript block is "__QuickLinksScript__".
